local city = Context.get('currentMessage')
Context.set('city', city)

local hook = "http://api.weatherapi.com/v1/current.json?key=98dde8c07fce46b2843215719212201&q="..city
local data = Invoke.webhook(hook, 'GET', '')
local temp = data.current.temp_c
local condition = data.current.condition.text

Context.set('temp', tostring(temp))
Context.set('condition', tostring(condition))

Workflow.branch(129)
